DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study to investigate whether montelukast lead to behavior problems in children with asthma.
DOC.brief_title: To Investigate the Effect of Montelukast on Behavior Problems in Children With Asthma
DOC.criteria: To have asthmatic children aged 1860 months To have that receive prophylactic treatment for asthma Healthy children will be enrolled among those being brought for routine controls Children with other chronic disease Children with chronic drug use (except for the treatment of asthma)
